00040 // MIN_CONSEC_GOOD_FRAMES defines how many consecutive valid MP3 frames
00041 //   we need to see before we decide we are looking at a real MP3 file
00042 #define MIN_CONSEC_GOOD_FRAMES 4
00043 #define FRAME_HEADER_SIZE 4
00044 #define MIN_FRAME_SIZE 21
00045 #define NUM_SAMPLES 4
00046 #define TEXT_FIELD_LEN  30
00047 #define INT_FIELD_LEN   4

00068 typedef struct {
00069         unsigned int sync;
00070         unsigned int version;
00071         unsigned int layer;

00084 typedef struct {
00085         char title[31];

00087         char album[31];
00088         char year[5];
00089         char comment[31];
00090         unsigned char track[1];
00091         unsigned char genre[1];
00092 } id3tag;

00109 // mode field:
00110 // 00 - Stereo
00111 // 01 - Joint stereo (Stereo)
00112 // 10 - Dual channel (2 mono channels)
00113 // 11 - Single channel (Mono)
